question: You are planning to spend a weekend at a hotel with your family. Write a letter to the hotel making the arrangements. Include the following: when you want to arrive and leave/ explain the type of rooms you would like and ask how much they will cost/ ask about activities and places of interest near the hotel
text: I am writing this letter to you to make arrange my holiday. I decided to spend my vacation with my family in your hotel.
Firstly, I decided to book my room online but because of some reasons I prefer to get confirmation from you. We will arrive on 3rd June at 14 pm and probably stay at your hotel until 8th June.

Secondly, my performance is an ample sea view room with full facilities such as Sauna and Jacuzzi with  one-bed connect room for my children. In addition, I want to know about its cost because I have limited financial resources.

Moreover, I am anxious to know about your indoor facilities as well as other entertainment which suitable for us and our little children, also, I interested in know about all tourist attractions near your area if you introduce me I can search on the internet and choose the best of them.
Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter. I looking forward to hearing from you.
